title: En teh Chhandamtu chu an hruai ta
lyrics:
En teh, Chhandamtu chu an hruai ta,
A hling lukhum nen;
Hmelma chhiar sen lohten an chhawm,
Kalvari tlang thlengin.

Kan sual vanga i tuarna chuan,
I thlan thisenin a fartir;
I aw nem duhawm tak chhuak chu,
I chamreng ka thinlungah hian.

Ka en ngam lo ka Lalpa duh tak,
Hmelmaten an vua;
A tuar natzia ka sawi thei lo,
Ka tan a nun a pe.

Thihna rapthlak tak a tuar lai khan,
Tuin nge tanpui?
"Ka Pa, ka Pa," tiin a au,
Thing anchhedawngah khan.

Aw ka thlarau, Chhandamtu thihna,
Zion-ah kal la;
Chutah ngaihdamna i hmu an
 g,
A thisen atang chuan.
